not_configured_yet: Ahazibeghị sistemụ ma. Ọkachamara ntọlite a ga-enyere gị aka n'ịkwalite sistemụ gị ma na-arụ ọrụ na usoro ole na ole.
system_config_include_demo: Tinye ihe ngosi nwere mmemme ngwaọrụ emepụtara
dashboard_from_group: Mepụta dashboard site na otu a
cronwizard_schedule_set_slot_end:
Bido na {{start}}.
 Tọọ ngwụcha ngwụcha oge.
cronwizard_bindings_define_types_and_mod: Kọwaa ụdị na modul ndị dabere na nhazi oge a (nhọrọ)
cronwizard_action_set_action_to_execute: Tọọ ihe iji mezuo ihe omume a
cronwizard_action_schedule_variable_hint: Jiri @{{name}} dị ka mgbanwe n'okwu cron ma ọ bụ jiri Scheduler.IsScheduling("@{{name}}") na mmemme akpaaka iji rụtụ aka na mmemme a.
main_code_empty_note: Koodu "isi" abaghị uru. Jiri onye nchịkọta akụkọ "Visual code" mepụta koodu a: - Mepee ụdị "Mmemme" site na palette iwu dị n'aka ekpe - Dọrọ ngọngọ nke ụdị "Main" na oghere ọrụ koodu - Tinye n'ime ya ihe mgbochi koodu ndị ọzọ iji mejuputa omume na mgbagha nke usoro ihe omume a.
setup_code_empty_note: Koodu "Ntọala" efu. Jiri onye nchịkọta akụkọ "Visual code" mepụta koodu a: - Mepee ụdị "Mmemme" site na palette iwu n'aka ekpe - Dọrọ ngọngọ nke ụdị "Ntọala" na oghere ọrụ koodu - Tinye n'ime ya ihe mgbochi koodu ndị ọzọ iji chọpụta ọnọdụ ndị ga-akpalite "Isi" koodu ogbugbu a na-enyocha koodu a oge ọ bụla ihe omume ọhụrụ mere na ọ dịkarịa ala otu ugboro n'otu nkeji.
capture_commands_description: Tinye iwu niile ejiri aka mee na wijetị na mmemme ahụ.

16.Title: Ebe nchekwa ọkwa
16.Description: Chekwaa ma cheta ọkwa dimmer ikpeazụ.
16.HomeGenie.LevelMemory: Cheta ọkwa ọkụ ikpeazụ mgbe agbanyere ya

26.Title: Agba ọkụ
26.Description: Ọmụmaatụ Philips Hue ọkụ nchikota site na iji HTTP API (V1). Onye ọrụ ndabara iji jikọọ na akwa mmiri bụ "onye nrụpụta ọhụrụ" na ekwesịrị ịgbanye ya.

34.Title: Amụma ihu igwe
34.Description: Ozi ihu igwe na amụma sitere na ọrụ mapụ ihu igwe mepere emepe. Iji rụọ ọrụ wijetị a, tinye igodo API bara uru. Soro ntuziaka na https://openweathermap.org/appid iji nweta igodo API efu.

77.Title: MQTT netwọkụ
77.Description: Jikọọ na onye na-ere ahịa MQTT ka iji ngwa HomeGenie Panel site na ebe ọ bụla site na ịntanetị ma ọ bụ jikọọ ngwaọrụ HomeGenie n'otu netwọkụ MQTT.
77.MQTT.SensorPublish: Bipụta mmemme nke modul a wepụtara
77.ConfigureOptions.Encryption: Kwado izo ya ezo na ngwụcha ruo ngwụcha (E2EE)

78.Title: Smart Thermostat
78.Description: Jiri ihe mmetụta okpomọkụ ọ bụla yana mgba ọkụ smart iji mejuputa arụmọrụ thermostat.

81.Title: Nyochaa ike
81.Description: Mepụta ọnụ ọgụgụ maka oriri ike na ojiji nke ngwaọrụ.

82.Title: Ụdị Nchekwa Ike
82.Description: Debe ọkwa ọkụ n'okpuru pasenti nhazi.

88.Title: Igwefoto IP izugbe
88.Description: Gosipụta/nri ihe onyonyo ụzọ site na igwefoto IP.
88.IpCamera.ImageURL: URL API igwefoto (lee dọkụmentị igwefoto gị)

90.Title: Sistemụ mkpu nchekwa
90.Description: Jiri sensọ na ngwaọrụ ndị ọzọ mejuputa sistemụ mkpu nchekwa.
90.HomeGenie.SecurityTriggerHome: Na-akpalikwa mgbe a na-eji ngwá ụlọ
90.HomeGenie.SecuritySensor: Jiri dị ka ihe nchekwa ihe mmetụta
90.ConfigureOptions.Email.Recipients: E-mail ndị nnata kewapụrụ rịkọm maka ọkwa mkpu
90.ConfigureOptions.Trigger.ArmedProgram: Mmemme na-agba ọsọ mgbe eji ngwa agha
90.ConfigureOptions.Trigger.DisarmedProgram: Mmemme na-agba ọsọ mgbe a tọhapụrụ ya

111.Title: Nhazi onye ahịa
111.Description: Na-eme API maka ijikwa profaịlụ nhazi onye ahịa nke a na-eji chekwaa UI na ntọala dashboards.

400.Title: Ihe ngosi Module Virtual
400.Description: Jiri aka tọọ ụkpụrụ nke ngwaọrụ mebere.
400.Status.Level: Gbanwee ọkwa (gbanyụọ ma ọ bụ gbanyụọ)

401.Title: Ihe ngosi - Gbanwee ọnụ ụzọ
401.Description: Na-emepe ọnụ ụzọ mepere/emechi nke ihe mmetụta ọnụ ụzọ-window ngosi.

402.Title: Ihe ngosi - Achọpụtara ngagharị
402.Description: Na-eme nchọpụta ngagharị nke ihe mmetụta ọtụtụ ihe ngosi.

410.Title: Sensọ Simulator
410.Description: Wepụta ụkpụrụ ihe mmetụta enweghị usoro.

505.Title: Njikwa anya
505.Description: Jikwaa ngwaọrụ site na iji ebe dịpụrụ adịpụ (IR ma ọ bụ RF).

142.Title: Akaụntụ Email
142.Description: Na-echekwa ozi akaụntụ email nke mmemme sistemụ na-eji maka izipu/nata ozi-e.

145.Title: Ngwa smart
145.Description: Gbanyụọ/ gbanyụọ ngwaọrụ dabere na nchọpụta ngagharị yana ọkụ gburugburu.
145.HomeGenie.SmartLights.MinLuminance: Gbanwuo ma ọ bụrụ na luminance dị n'okpuru:

8.Title: Ihe ngosi agba ọwụwa anyanwụ
8.Description: Ihe atụ "Ọwụwa anyanwụ" dị n'ọnọdụ maka agba na-agbanwe ọkụ ikanam.
8.Scenarios.SunriseColors: Njikọ na ọnọdụ ọdịda anyanwụ agba

910.Title: Nchọpụta ihe
910.Description: Chọpụta ihe n'iji ụdị YOLO a zụrụ azụ.
910.ML.ObjectDetection.TriggerDetect: Ndepụta ihe ndị kewapụrụ rịkọm (na Bekee) ga-akpalite mkpu. (dịka ọmụmaatụ: pusi, nkịta, mmadụ, akpa azụ, akpa)

911.Title: Ntụle ọnọdụ
911.Description: Nchọpụta isi ihe site na nleba anya pose, na-eji ụdị ONNX omenala ma ọ bụ ụdị YOLO a zụrụ nke ọma (kpọmkwem pose mmadụ).

912.Title: Nkeji ihe atụ
912.Description: Chọpụta ihe na ndepụta ha site n'iji ụdị YOLO a zụrụ azụ.

930.Title: Gemini Intent Handler
930.Description: Na-enyere njikwa asụsụ eke maka sistemụ smart gị site na iji Gemini AI nke Google. Iji mee ka njirimara a rụọ ọrụ, tinye igodo API dị irè. Soro ntuziaka a na https://aistudio.google.com/app/apikey iji nweta igodo API efu.

931.Title: Gemini wijetị Genie
931.Description: Genie AI nkeonwe gị maka imepụta wijetị. Gemini kwadoro ya, ọ na-enyere gị aka ide na ihichapụ HTML, CSS na koodu Javascript ozugbo n'ime onye nchịkọta akụkọ HomeGenie. Iji mee ka njirimara a rụọ ọrụ, tinye igodo API dị irè. Soro ntuziaka a na https://aistudio.google.com/app/apikey iji nweta igodo API efu.

940.Title: Mpaghara AI (LLM)
940.Description: Gbaa Ụdị Asụsụ buru ibu (LLM) na mpaghara gị na sava HomeGenie. Enwere ike ibudata ụdị ndị a n'efu site na nyiwe dị ka ịmakụ ihu. Naanị nye ụzọ gaa na faịlụ ụdị GGUF. Biko mara na enwere ike ịchọ mgbanwe na paramita, nke kachasị n'ime Usoro Ọdịnaya, iji hụ na ndakọrịta zuru oke na ụdị dị iche iche.
